attributes.action: voluntarily surrender and submit to the justice of the International Courts in The Hague upon leaving office.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is often said that those who have done nothing wrong have nothing to fear from justice.

On this basis we call upon the PM to lead by example, to encourage independent scrutiny of the actions undertaken by this Government during the period of his office, and by so doing show all current and future world leaders that:

(i) nobody is above justice; and

(ii) they should fear justice but not be afraid of judgement where their conscience is clear.
